text: The Canton of Bastia-2 is one of the 15 cantons of the Haute-Corse department, France. Since the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, the communes of the canton of Bastia-2 are:Décret n° 2014-255 du 26 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de la Haute- Corse *Bastia (partly) ==References== Bastia-2 Canton 2
title: Canton of Bastia-2
